.
Survivors Pension Entitlement in Willful Misconduct Cases
Survivors Pension benefits may be payable if death
was
not
in the LOD, or
was due to willful misconduct, and
occurs in service.
In order to be eligible for pension benefits, the Veteran must meet certain minimum service requirements.  Under these circumstances verify whether the Veteran had the requisite service in accordance with
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.F.6.a
.
Reference
:  For more information on Veteran status, see
38 CFR 3.1(d)
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section C  - Willful Misconduct and Line of Duty (LOD)
